NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: As UConn barreled through the West Regional, the story was not only the victories, but also the news reports about an investigation of the school’s program.
snippet: As UConn barreled through the West Regional, the story was not only the victories, but also the news reports about an investigation of the school’s program.
